General.Name: Kritika Wires Limited
General.Description: Kritika Wires Limited engages in the manufacture and supply of industrial steel and galvanized wires in India. The company offers mild steel, GI stay, A.C.S.R core, cotton bailing, indented PC, spring steel, barbed, umbrella rib, and rolling shutter wires, as well as galvanized strands for earthing, ACSR core wire strands, and PC strands for railway sleepers. It serves retail and industrial customers. The company also exports its products. Kritika Wires Limited was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Kolkata, India.
General.Address: Unit No. 201, Bus Terminus & Commercial, Kolkata, India, 700156
